body.description: Create a space for small toiletries and bathroom clutter with this woodgrain two-door wall cabinet. Featuring stylish woodgrain and rectangular, oil-rubbed bronze knobs, this storage cabinet adds instant organization and a stylish touch to bathrooms, laundry rooms, entryways and more. Interior features a 3-position adjustable shelf that moves up, down or out for a storage space customized to your needs. Want to add even more style? Utilize the open shelf to display candles, small succulents, or other decorative accents. Includes easy-to-follow instructions for seamless assembly and wall mounting. Complete the look and add more storage with the rest of the RiverRidge® Hayward Collection items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice wall cabinet. Matches my other bathroom decor, vanity, etc.
reviews.reviewText: Bought condo, remodeled bathroom in mocha / espresso color scheme. Decided on these cabinets for both bathrooms, and they look great!My brother put them together and installed them. Seems like they were pretty easy.Minor quibble(s): on one, the doors firmly stuck to the magnetic backplate when closed. On the other, one of the doors wouldn't firmly click closed but kept popping back off. Eventually, I had to fiddle with unscrewing the magnetic pieces and slightly fiddling with placement [there was slight play in the positioning without having to completely remove the pieces]. Managed to get alignment "just close enough" that the door seems to actually stay put now and not click off the magnetic back plate, but it was tricky and I had to fiddle with it a couple times.Also, just inspecting it, after my brother installed it, it serms like there's only two attachment screws connecting it to the wall. Not sure if it comes pre-drilled that way, or not? But, I feel like it may need a couple more screws anchored into the drywall or whatnot, in hopes that more attachment points might make it less likely to somehow come off the wall?Overall, nice cabinet, classy, seems reasonably well-made from my layman's perspective. And matches the color scheme of the other decor / cabinets pretty well...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little bit difficult to assemble, but quality is good
reviews.reviewText: It is now my new medicine cabinet, with plenty of room for any medicinal purpose. Looks good, blends well with our furnishings

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Some of the instructions were not totally clear. I had to put it away and come back to it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used it to hide household tools
reviews.reviewText: We needed a spot to put our tools, because they pile up in the kitchen. I figured out that the issue was we needed storage that was in line of sight from the front and back door. Wall mounted items are critical in our house and they keep our horizontal spaces clean. It holds the drill, several screw drivers, a drill battery charging station, etc and then screw boxes etc on the shelf. I added a battery operated light to the underside of the shelf. Works great for our needs! I plan to add a little dollar tree peg board so that it is less messy, but for now, it keeps tools out of sight and away from our toddler. Oh, and we did drill a hole in the back so we could run the charger cord down the wall. It makes a messy and dirty set of items a lot more organized and helps me breathe in our space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: we did a full bath reno and the top of our toilet looks so dull.. we were thinking of getting just a shelf but turns out returning that and buying this cabinet that matches the color of our vanity. perfect size, well built compressed wood. easy to assemble and hang. if you can build an ikea cabinet, pretty sure u can build this. Amazon is the cheapest price.. u can get this to home depot and target but those are much expensive for the same model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Plan a trip to the hardware store
reviews.reviewText: This is a cheap unit, as expected, not a good solid wood piece…but that part is pretty obvious. The biggest issue is the pre-drilled holes are all either too loose, (for the dowels and cam locks), or too small, (for the screws). This would not even be a huge issue IF the screws were not so cheap. The screws strip out constantly (even with hand tightening them all), and they don’t give you any extra, meaning you WILL have to go to your local hardware store and find some matching tiny wood screws to finish assembly.Additionally they include no plastic screw head covers for the cam locks and 4 large silver screws on the bottom…looks cheap, and unprofessional. Would NOT recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Gave as a gift and she loved it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice cabinet, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Nice cabinet, easy to assemble although I managed to put the shelf upside down. There is a slight flaw (lighter color) on the edge of the door, but that's all. I'd love to find the door knobs to buy so that I could replace ones on my sink cabinet. These are nice with a slight texture to them. You'll need help mounting it to the wall.
